page.title: 07Rawson's Cars and Caravans
page.content: The man that we interviewed was very helpful. On average he said he sold {175 cars a year.}The very popular cars were those with space in the back and economical cars. {Caravans}were very popular in the summer. He did get sporty cars in stock as well. People come from roughly a 15-mile (25km) radius to buy cars at Rawson's. They have a{variety of vehicles}from Range Rovers to Minis. They would usually sell about 8 caravans and 6 to 7 used cars a week. People who come to buy caravans come from almost everywhere. When a car breaks down they do all they can to offer{good service}to encourage the people to use the firm again. Mr Rawson owns the company and he lives in Mayfield Lane, Wadhurst. He once gave a party for all the employees of Rawson's.
